audience_members_retention_idx.name: audience_members_retention_idx
audience_members_retention_idx.where: type = 'anonymous' AND email IS NULL AND phone IS NULL

idx_click_events_non_bot.name: idx_click_events_non_bot
idx_click_events_non_bot.where: is_bot = false OR is_bot IS NULL

notification_subscriptions_contact_requi.name: notification_subscriptions_contact_required
notification_subscriptions_contact_requi.value: "notification_subscriptions"."email" IS NOT NULL OR "notification_subscriptions"."phone" IS NOT NULL

content_slug_redirects_content_match.name: content_slug_redirects_content_match
content_slug_redirects_content_match.value:
(content_type = 'release' AND release_id IS NOT NULL AND track_id IS NULL)
        OR (content_type = 'track' AND track_id IS NOT NULL AND release_id IS NULL)

provider_links_owner_match.name: provider_links_owner_match
provider_links_owner_match.value:
(owner_type = 'release' AND release_id IS NOT NULL AND track_id IS NULL)
        OR (owner_type = 'track' AND track_id IS NOT NULL AND release_id IS NULL)

smart_link_targets_owner_match.name: smart_link_targets_owner_match
smart_link_targets_owner_match.value:
(release_id IS NOT NULL AND track_id IS NULL)
        OR (track_id IS NOT NULL AND release_id IS NULL)

idx_creator_profiles_featured_query.name: idx_creator_profiles_featured_query
idx_creator_profiles_featured_query.where: is_public = true AND is_featured = true AND marketing_opt_out = false

idx_creator_profiles_fit_score_unclaimed.name: idx_creator_profiles_fit_score_unclaimed
idx_creator_profiles_fit_score_unclaimed.where: is_claimed = false AND fit_score IS NOT NULL
